dcterms:creator: Emad Barsoum
Cha Zhang
Cristian Canton Ferrer
Zhengyou Zhang
dcterms:description: FERPlus consists of 28,709 training images, 3,589 validation images and 3,589 test images. They are all in grayscale and size of 48 × 48. Each image was manually assigned to one of 8 predeﬁned expression classes - neutral, happiness, surprise, sadness, anger, disgust, fear, contempt - by in total of 10 annotators.
dcterms:title: FERPlus

dcterms:creator: Thanh-Hung Vo
Guee-Sang Lee
Hyung-Jeong Yang
Soo-Hyung Kim
dcterms:description: RAF-DB contains 29,672 facial images annotated with basic or compound expressions independently labeled by 40 annotators. It only consists of seven different expressions, excluding contempt. For our experiment, we use aligned RAF-DB, where all 12,271 training images and 3,068 test images are resized to 100 × 100.
dcterms:title: RAF-DB
